title: Champion Lobby Ward Skins picture.
body: The ward icon is misaligned and is higher than the summoner spells, and it's bothersome. I don't know if it's an accident or on purpose, but even imaqtpie thought it was bothering him.

replies.body:
Hey CrazyMurph! 

Thanks for the report! We're working on getting better aligned - this is still a new feature, so we've got a few kinks to work out! ^-^
Thank you KateyKhaos for responding and looking into it!
Thanks for taking the time to point it out! :]

While you're here, can I mention that it's a little awkward that you have to click one and then hit the "x" to close the window? Personally, I'd love it if it worked more like the summoner spells, so that when you clicked, it would automatically close.

You might have already thought about that. Just wanted to pitch in in case you didn't.
We're still working on the UI - this is the first time we've implemented selecting ward skins in champion select. Feedback is certainly welcome. :]
Thanks for the reply! I know you guys will continue working on it and it will be great when it's finished.
No worries - thanks for taking the time to leave feedback. :D
